message.content: {"given_definition_quality":45,"better_definition":"used to show an action happened in the past","sentence":"他来过。","image_prompt":"A young person stands at the doorway of a simple house, turning away as if having just visited. The scene is set in soft, hazy light with gentle pastel colors, suggesting a recent but now-completed event. Traces of distant ruined buildings and faded skies give an apocalyptic backdrop, but everything is calm. Animation style: soft apocalypse, expressive and gentle.","sentence_translation":"He has been here before."}
